fr.umlv.MasterPilot

Class SpaceShuttle

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.MasterPilot.FlyingObject
      • fr.umlv.MasterPilot.SpaceShuttle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ennemies, EnnemyShuttle1, EnnemyShuttle2, EnnemyShuttle3, EnnemyShuttle4, EnnemyShuttle5, EnnemysubShuttle1, EnnemysubShuttle2, EnnemysubShuttle3, MainShuttle

    public abstract class SpaceShuttle
extends FlyingObject
    Space shuttle is an abstract class wich extends FlyingObject All shuttle, player and ennemys extends this. It contains method for all shuttle like position and movement.

                 RocketType rocketType,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 direction,
                 CollisionCategory col)
        Fire by the space shuttle to a point, with specified rocket type
        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics2D where the rocket of space shuttle will be draw.
        rocketType - Graphics2D where the rocket of space shuttle will be draw.
        x - X coordinate for direction of fire.
        y - Y coordinate for direction of fire.
        direction - is the direction in in which the spaceshuttle fires.
        col - Collision Category
